name: Seattle Map Print
description:
Great graphic map prints from Archie's Press!!  

Choose from a 17.5" x 17.5" screen print or a 7.75" x  7.75" letterpress print.  

Comes in 4 different colors (but blue is the best).

options.name: 17.5" Black Ink on White Paper-Screen Print
17.5" Black Ink on Kraft Paper-Screen Print
17.5" Blue Ink on White Paper-Screen Print
17.5" Blue Ink on Kraft Paper-Screen Print

name: Solar System Map Print
description:
Great graphic solar system map prints from Archie's Press!!  

Choose from a 17.5" x 17.5" screen print or a 7.75" x  7.75" letterpress print in either black ink on white paper or black ink on kraft paper.

options.name: 17.5" Black Ink on White Paper-Screen Print
17.5" Black Ink on Kraft Paper-Screen Print

name: Old Timey Slingshot + Felt Ammo
description:
7 1/2" wood slingshot is sure to delight the young and old alike!!  Add a bag of felt ammo (12 1" balls) for extra safe fun!

Please use responsibly under adult supervision.  It's all fun and games until someone get's cranky!

name: Cuppow! BNTO Canning Jar Adapter!!
description:
The fellas over at Cuppow have done it again!! Make any mason jar a lunchbox!  Finally an easy way to separate dressings an dips from the rest of your delicious lunch.  Never eat soggy salad again!! 

The BNTO adapter fits any standard wide mouth canning jar.  6 oz. capacity.  Made in the USA from recycled food-grade polypropylene.  Pretty much the best thing that has happened to lunch in forever!!

**Item is slated to ship 7/16.  Still en route to us!

name: Cuppow! For wide mouth OR regular canning jars!
description:
Holy Cuppow!  Turn any mason jar into a travel mug...  Just replace the seal with a Cuppow and screw the lid back on!  Great for hot or cold beverages all day everyday!

Made in the US, BPA free, and packaged up in a sweet letterpress sleeve...  Pretty sure this product couldn't be any cooler!

Choose from wide mouth or regular!

options.name: Wide Mouth-Original Cuppow (pictured in orange packaging)

name: Darn Fine Canvas Apron
description:
Sturdy canvas apron with big hip pockets, twill ties, and silver grommets.  Adjustable neck strap.  Great construction and even better looking!  Perfect for cooking or studio work!  

Approximately 26" wide by 25" long 

Machine wash cold and line dry. Hot iron as needed.

Available colors: kelly green. banana yellow, light green, and caramel.  See photos for color choices.

name: Cotton Ticking Apron-Blue or Red Stripe
description:
Fabulous cotton pinstripe apron.  Available in red or blue stripe.  Apron features an adjustable neck, long sashes, and 2 large pockets.  25" wide x 28" long.  Definitely a shop fave!!

-Machine wash, line dry, hot iron

name: Organic Flour Sack Towel-Chevron
description:
- 100% Organic and eco friendly flour sack cotton
- Machine Wash
- 28"L, 21" W
- Hand screen printed in USA by Little Korboose

name: Organic Flour Sack Towel-Plaid
description:
- 100% Organic and eco friendly flour sack cotton
- Machine Wash
- 28"L, 21" W
- Hand screen printed in USA by Little Korboose
-Natural color towel with black ink

name: Organic Flour Sack Towel-New Mexico
description:
- 100% Organic and eco friendly flour sack cotton
- Machine Wash
- 28"L, 21" W
- Hand screen printed in USA by Little Korboose
-Natural color towel with black ink

name: Handmade Porcelain and Driftwood Spoon
description:
So very lovely!  

Hand formed porcelain spoon heads made specifically to compliment each piece of found driftwood.  No 2 will ever be alike but sizes range from 6" to 11".  The driftwood has been polyurethane coated to bring out the natural grain.  All spoons are internally steel reinforced in both the handle and the head.



Made in California by Linda Fahey, an avid beach lover/ceramic artist.  

*As seen in Gray Magazine May 2013!!

name: Hippo Door Mat
description:
Oh, Giant Hippo Doormat... Let me count the ways... 

Ed Annink has expanded the use of the statistic pictograms of Gerd Arntz (1900-1988) by putting them into doormats.  Lucky us, one of these images was a charming hippopotamus!  Produced by Droog, a Dutch design group.

Material:
Coir
PVC

Dimension
57.1" x 27.2"

***Please note dimensions listed above.  This is a very large hippo doormat.  57.1" across by 27.2" tall.  For those of us who love hippo doormats, this dimension is not important... For other people, the sheer greatness of this item may be any issue.

Made in the Netherlands

name: Butter Home Gift Certificates-from
description:
Take the pressure off of gifting and let us snail mail a cute gift certificate right to you or your recipient!  Each gift certificate comes with a unique code to be used online or here in the shop.  Gift certificates do not expire and can be split up and used at more than one time.

Choose the amount from the drop down menu below. 

Not seeing the amount you had in mind?  Feel free to email us at info@butterhomeseattle.com and we can make up a special one just for you!

Free shipping on all gift certificates!

name: Ostrich Pillow
description:
Well, it's official...  you have fabulous taste!

Hand printed pillow with the legendary Ostrich on the front in deep brown and a very pleasing gold duck canvas reverse.   Cream edge welting and an invisible zipper closure at the base. 

Totally eco-friendly from ink to canvas to insert!  Machine wash gentle on cold/line dry.

Size: 12" x 20" 

Designed, printed, and constructed by Nell & Mary in Portland, OR.

name: Recycled Fence Post Wall Vase
description:
Sweet as pie!!  Reclaimed and recycled, these wood wall vases are as easy on the environment as they are on the eyes.  Made from 100 year old American Chestnut split rail fence pieces!!  By the 1950's the blight (tree fungus from Asia) had nearly wiped out American Chestnut... Making this old wood even more special.

Fitted with a sawtooth picture hanger and a small vase insert to hold water.  

Small: 8"-9" x 3"-4"
Large: 11"-12" x 3"-4"

Due to the age of the wood and the handmade nature of these products, each piece will vary slightly from the photos... We promise they will be just as lovely!

name: Oh Darling, Let's Be Adventurers-20" X 14" Print
description:
Sweet screen print on acid free, archival quality paper.  Fabulous bold type!!  What's not to love? 

Who doesn't want to be an adventurer??

Choose from 11" x 14" or 16" x 20".

name: Lovely Little Pocket Knife
description:
The Charlie Tiny Folding Knife

Son of a Sailor's has taken the classic French Opinel stainless steel  pocket knife, and and their touch with signal flag-inspired colorblocking. This sweet little beechwood model features a carbon blade and is just 2 1/4" long when folded!  

Choose from gold, coral, or blue.

name: Old Timey Dinner Bell
description:
These are the best!!  

Made from ½” hot roll round steel.  Each side measures approximately 13".  Comes with a nifty leather hanging loop.

Made in Iowa.

*Due to their weight, these dinner bells are a little pricey to ship.

name: Recycled Fence Post Treasure Box
description:
Sweet as pie!! Reclaimed and recycled, these wood treasure boxes are as easy on the environment as they are on the eyes. Made from 100 year old American Chestnut split rail fence pieces!! By the 1950's the blight (tree fungus from Asia) had nearly wiped out American Chestnut... Making this old wood even more special.

Each box has a little drawer meticulously sawed from the same piece of wood.  Roughly 6" long x 2" tall x 3.5" deep.

Due to the age of the wood and the handmade nature of these products, each box will vary slightly from the photos... We promise they will be just as lovely!

name: Globe Lights!  25' of Indoor/Outdoor party lights!
description:
By popular demand we now offer 25 foot strings of globe lights!  The bulbs are clear and about the size of a golf ball (1 1/2" diameter).  The wires are green.  End to end connectors... up to three strings.  Safe for indoor or outdoor use.  G40 bulbs in E12 sockets!  

A garden party essential!!!

name: Pendant Lamp-Gold Cord
description:
A fun take on a classic style!  

A fabulous oiled brass socket hangs gracefully from 8' of twisted cloth covered cord.  Each lamp is fitted with a standard 2 prong plug.  The sockets are rated for 250 watts / 250 volts and all components are UL listed.  Any standard sized bulb fits in the E26 socket, though we recommend our 30 watt filament bulbs as they are just the right about of light for an exposed bulb.  http://www.butterhomeseattle.com/product/filament-edison-bulbs

Need a longer cord?  We stock these lamps with an 8 foot cord but can make them with any length cord you need.  Simply add cord by the foot on the drop down menu or email info@butterhomeseattle.com for more info.  Extra cord is $3 a foot.

Check out our vintage section for a wide array of awesome old pulleys to dress up your fixture even more!!  This is definitely a shop fave!!

options.name: Extra Cord by the foot-1 foot increments

name: Pendant Lamp-Mint Cord
description:
A fun take on a classic style!  

A fabulous oiled brass socket hangs gracefully from 8' of twisted cloth covered cord.  Each lamp is fitted with a standard 2 prong plug.  The sockets are rated for 250 watts / 250 volts and all components are UL listed.  Any standard sized bulb fits in the E26 socket, though we recommend our 30 watt filament bulbs as they are just the right about of light for an exposed bulb.  http://www.butterhomeseattle.com/product/filament-edison-bulbs

Check out our vintage section for a wide array of awesome old pulleys to dress up your fixture even more!!  This is definitely a shop fave!!

name: Filament/Edison Bulbs
description:
The perfect bulbs for an exposed fixture.  Mellow enough to look directly at but bright enough to light up a space.  Great for living/dining room fixtures.  30w at 120 volts. 

6" long with a 2 3/4" diameter.  $15

All style fit U.S. standard sockets.

name: Galvanized Iron Coasters
description:
Sometimes the simplest things are the most beautiful!

Galvanized iron coasters in either 4" (great for drinks), or 5" (perfect for a bottle of wine).

Perfecto!!

name: Birch Branch Coasters-Set of 4
description:
Sweet and simple birch branch coasters are the perfect accent to any style decor.   Hand sanded and bees wax finished.  Set of four all wrapped up with a lovely twine bow.

3" to 4" diameter.

*As seen in the Seattle Times Gift Guide

**Sold out until 1-15-14

name: Wood Doily Coasters!  Square
description:
Not your Grandma's doilies... that's for sure!

Set of 5 laser engraved birch doily coasters are sure to knock-the-socks-off your guests!  So sweet and modern.

3 1/2" square.

name: Wood Doily Coasters!
description:
Not your Grandma's doilies... that's for sure!

Set of 5 laser engraved birch doily coasters are sure to knock-the-socks-off your guests!  So sweet and modern.

Choose from 3 1/2" diameter natural birch or 3 1/2" square in natural and white.

name: Pyrex Glass Straws
description:
One of our best sellers!!  These clear Pyrex glass straws are dishwasher safe and totally durable for daily use.  Great for coffee, tea, acid, and sodas to keep your teeth bright and white!!

Choose from 5 1/4" or 8" in either bent or straight.  Sold individually.

*No straight style in stock available...  We are happy to special order them for you.  Tons of bent available!

name: Super Awesome Bicycle Glasses!  16 oz. pints
description:
These awesome glasses are hand screen printed with dishwasher safe glass ink to make them extra durable!  Glasses are made in the USA!

Photos scroll left to right: bluebird, navy, silver, gold, and charcoal.

So much fun!!!

name: Juice Glass Caddy
description:
This awesome galvanized caddy comes with 4 perfect little glasses.  Use for wine, juice, cocktails, condiments, flowers... the possibilities are endless.  

Caddy is 6"x6".  Glasses are 3 1/2" tall with a 2 1/2" diameter.

name: Simple Glass Tumblers and Carafe
description:
One of our best sellers!!  The simple and clean look is just stunning.  The glass is thick and the feel in your hand is very substantial.  Tumblers are heat tempered and can hold hot beverages as well as cold.  The carafe is for cold beverages only.

Tumbler:  2 1/2" dia x 4" h.  $7 each
Carafe: 3 1/4" dia x 10 1/4" h.  $24 each

name: Recycled Glass Salt Cellar with Spoon
description: Little tiny salt cellar measures 2" across and stands a mere 1" tall.  Hand blown from at least 50% recycled glass.  Each cellar comes ready to go with a spoon for all of your salting and spicing needs!

name: Mason Jar Mugs-Set of 12
description:
The grown up version of our little mason jar sippers!!  Includes 12 one pint jars with daisy perforated metal lids and 12 sturdy multi-color paper straws.  

From our extensive field research, these look best with a nice bourbon cocktail!!

Great for warm fall and winter drinks too!

Dishwasher/microwave safe

name: Mason Jar Sippers-Set of 12
description:
So cute!  Mason Jar Sippers hold 8 oz. of your favorite drink.  Perforated metal lids with straw holes fit perfectly on top.  Fantastic for a party or for everyday fun.  Sold as a set of 12 including 12 straws.

Dishwasher & microwave safe.

 



*As seen in Seattle Magazine Gift Guide Dec. 2012

name: Bent Nail Bottle Opener-Magnetic
description:
A simple tool of great utility. One magnet captures the bottle cap; one holds opener to the fridge.

4.5” x 1.5” x .75”

Walnut or Beech, Magnets, and a Bent Nail.

Choose from Solid Walnut, or Color Blocked Beech in blue or coral

By Brendan Ravenhill

name: Wall Mounting Bottle Opener
description: Never dig around in junk drawer again!  This wall mounting bottle opener is guaranteed not to get lost in the drawer and always stay put right where you left it!  3" tall and sticks out 1" from the wall.  Comes with hardware too!!!

name: Simple Corkscrew-Ebony or Rosewood
description:
The simpler the better for us!  

Don't let a big ol' clanky opener get between you and your wine...  The simple corkscrews will do the trick with ease and expediency.

Choose from Ebony or Rosewood

4 1/2" long by 1" wide

name: Porcelain 'Tin' Cans
description:
White porcelain 'tin' cans fitted with a gasket to make a perfect air tight seal.  Great for food storage!  How about the large size as your kitchen counter compost bin?  The small for sugar?  So much fun!!

Small: 3" across x 4" tall
Medium: 4" across x 5" tall
Large:  6" across x 6" tall

name: Porcelain Berry Baskets
description:
Sweet and lovely porcelain berry baskets!  Choose from raspberry (4" x 1 3/4": $14), strawberry (4 1/2" x 4" x 2 3/4": $25), or plum (5 1/2" x 3": $28).  

Can't decide??  How about the set of 3 for $65??

name: Porcelain Milk Carton
description: Fabulous white porcelain Milk Carton! 7" tall and 2 3/4" square at the base.  Microwave safe!

name: White Porcelain 12 Egg Crate
description: You can have the prettiest eggs in town!  Great for eggs or as a jewelry catch-all.  6" x 8".  Slip cast porcelain!

name: Porcelain Anchovy Tin
description:
Yes... this is real!  So stinking sweet!  Perfect for matches, toothpicks, tiny treasures, or anchovies!!!  Made of white porcelain.
  

4" l x 2" w x 1" h

name: Porcelain Gelato Cup and Spoon
description:
Sweet porcelain version of a gelato cup and little paddle style gelato spoon.  

Gelato Cup:  3 1/2 " across x 2" tall
Gelato Spoon:  4" long x 3/4" wide

Cup and spoon are sold separately.  Use drop down menu to select item and quantity. 



 ***As seen in Saveur, June 2012

name: Hand Forged Iron Cutlery-Set of 3
description:
Rustic small scale cutlery sold as a set of three: one knife, one fork, and one spoon.  Perfect for cheese or hors d'oeuvres!

So sweet and simple and well made!  

4 3/4"-5 3/4" length x 1" wide.

Mineral oil finished.  To keep your forged iron pieces looking tip top, hand wash and dry.  Occasionally apply mineral or cooking oil sparingly to keep finish like new.

name: Sweet Hand Forged Snips
description: Great little rustic snips... 4.25" x 2".  Perfect for trimming flowers or other various kitchen snippings.

name: Recycled Metal Sapling Utensils
description:
Sweet little utensils are perfect for serving jams, cheeses, olives and other hors d'oeuvres.  Made from recycled metals.    

Demitasse Spoon measures 4 3/4" long x 3/4" wide.
Fork measures 4 3/4" long x 1/2" wide.
Spreader measures 5 1/2" long x 3/4" wide.

name: Toast Board with Spreader
description: How sweet!!  A toast shaped wood cutting board with a perfect hand carved spreader.  Would be darling for a sandwich or toast, as a cheese or butter board, or on a picnic!!  5 1/4" x 6 1/4".

name: Washington State Cutting Board-2 sizes!
description:
**Featured in Northwest Home Magazine!!

So cool!!!  Handcrafted Washington State Cutting boards are sure to liven up your chopping and dicing in the kitchen.  Small boards are 11" x 8" and large boards are 16" x 12".  Mineral oil finished.  Alder wood!

Made in Seattle special just for BH!

name: Cork Serving Bowls-Round
description:
Our new fave here at Butter Home!  These Cork Serving Bowls are just about the coolest thing since sliced bread.  Harvesting cork does not harm the tree making it the perfect renewable resource.  Shape and fold these bowls however you please... even cuff the top for a shallower bowl.  Naturally anti-microbial, these bowls are perfect for a salad or bread or whatever you want to serve.  One more thing:  They are MACHINE WASHABLE!  Or a little soap and water will do the trick also. 

Machine wash cold/reshape and line dry.  

12" across x 6" deep

name: Cork Serving Bowl-Rectangle
description:
Our new fave here at Butter Home!  These Cork Serving Bowls are just about the coolest thing since sliced bread.  Harvesting cork does not harm the tree making it the perfect renewable resource.  Shape and fold these bowls however you please... even cuff the top for a shallower bowl.  Naturally anti-microbial, these bowls are perfect for a salad or bread or whatever you want to serve.  One more thing:  They are MACHINE WASHABLE!  Or, a little soap and water will do the trick also. 

Machine wash cold/reshape and line dry.  

Rectangle:  12"l x 8"w x 4 1/2" deep

name: Cork Cutting Boards-Small, Medium, Large or Set of all 3!
description:
A what???  Yes, that is right a 100% renewable cork cutting board.  Why cork is so awesome:  It is naturally anti-microbial as will help your knives stay sharper longer.  Harvesting cork does not harm the tree making it an incredible renewable resource.  Wash with soap and water. 

Small: 8.5" x 6"     $15
Medium:  12" x 8"  $25
Large:  14" x 10"   $35

Cant decide... try all 3 sizes for $70

name: Giant Mango Wood Round Cutting/Serving Board
description:
Holy moly!!  This is a very large and lovely slab of sustainably harvested mango wood.  Sanded smooth and mineral oil finished, this board is ready to help you cut and serve your heart out.  Completely food safe. Handwash only.

Each board varies due to their handmade nature. They are roughly 16" diameter x 2" tall.

name: Ombre Orange Salad Servers
description:
Finally... Attractive and reasonably priced salad servers!!  Artisan made out of excess material from the logging industry!  Completely food safe. Handwash only.

Ombre orange paint adds a great pop to these utensils!!  

Each set varies due to their handmade nature. They are roughly 11.5" long.

name: Large Mango Wood Bowl
description:
Just lovely.  Sustainably harvested + artisan made makes these bowls a substantial piece of functional art for your home.  Great for salads and pastas!  Completely food safe.  Handwash only.    

Each bowl varies due to their handmade nature.  They are roughly 12" diameter x 4" tall.

name: Mango Wood Platter
description:
Just lovely. Sustainably harvested + artisan made makes these platters a substantial piece of functional art for your home.  Completely food safe. Handwash only.

Each platter varies due to their handmade nature. They are roughly 13" diameter x 15" tall.

name: Large Mango Wood Serving Plate
description:
Just lovely. Sustainably harvested + artisan made makes these plates a substantial piece of functional art for your home.  Completely food safe. Handwash only.

Each plate varies due to their handmade nature. They are roughly 12" diameter x 1" tall.

name: Mango Wood Bowl
description:
Just lovely. Sustainably harvested + artisan made makes these bowls a substantial piece of functional art for your home. Great for snacks or treasures!

2.5" tall x roughly 4" diameter 

Each bowl varies due to their handmade nature.

name: Root Veggies Tea Towel
description:
So very pretty handprinted/handsewn Nell & Mary tea towel!  17" x 24" with a little loop for hanging.  

Cotton/Linen blend.  Upcycled from industry remnants.  

Machine wash/tumble dry.

Designed and printed in Portland, OR.

name: Broccoli Tea Towel
description:
So very pretty handprinted/handsewn Nell & Mary tea towel!  17" x 24" with a little loop for hanging.  

Cotton/Linen blend.  Upcycled from industry remnants.  

Machine wash/tumble dry.

Designed and printed in Portland, OR.

name: Umbrellas Tea Towel
description:
So very pretty handprinted/handsewn Nell & Mary tea towel!  17" x 24" with a little loop for hanging.  

Cotton/Linen blend.  Upcycled from industry remnants.  

Machine wash/tumble dry.

Designed and printed in Portland, OR.

name: Feather Cities Tea Towel
description:

Cotton/Linen blend.  Upcycled from industry remnants.  

Machine wash/tumble dry.

Designed and printed in Portland, OR.

name: Morels Tea Towel
description:
So very pretty handprinted/handsewn Nell & Mary tea towel!  17" x 24" with a little loop for hanging.  

Cotton/Linen blend.  Upcycled from industry remnants.  

Machine wash/tumble dry.

Designed and printed in Portland, OR.

name: Best Smelling Candles EVER!!!
description:
8 oz of 100% soy wax, poured and scented by hand in small batches, make for the Best Smelling Candles EVER!!!  Not only that, but with a 50-60 hour burn time, these are an amazing product.  Packaged up in a mason jar with a twine bow.  Simple perfection!

Choose from:


Campfire
Lemon Verbena
Grapefruit & Mango
Lavender, Cucumber, & Sage

FALL SCENTS:

Pumpkin Pie
Apples, Maple, & Bourbon


WARNING:  Resist temptation.  Do not eat!

name: Printed Masking Tape-123
description:
How darling!  25 yards of the most delightful printed masking tape featuring a measuring tape pattern.  

The uses are endless!  Another shop favorite!!  Tape is 3/4" wide.

*Temporarily out of stock.  Hopefully more by 12-15-13

name: Printed Masking Tape-ABC
description:
How darling!  25 yards of the most delightful printed masking tape featuring the alphabet.  The entire alphabet is repeated 90 times per roll.  

The uses are endless!  Another shop favorite!!  Tape is 3/4" wide.

name: Sewn Paper Garland-15 feet-Marigold
description:
All things paper drive us wild here at BH!  This hand sewn confetti ribbon is perfect in so many ways!  

Use it for wrapping the packages of those you love most, or to decorate for a party, or save for a rainy day. 

Dots are 3/4" and 1" in a random pattern chose by the creator, Robin of Trash Can Fancy.  15 feet wound around recycled cardboard.

name: Sewn Paper Garland-15 feet-Off White
description:
All things paper drive us wild here at BH!  This hand sewn confetti ribbon is perfect in so many ways!  

Use it for wrapping the packages of those you love most, or to decorate for a party, or save for a rainy day. 

Dots are 3/4" and 1" in a random pattern chose by the creator, Robin of Trash Can Fancy.  15 feet wound around recycled cardboard.

description:

description:

name: Sewn Paper Garland-15 feet-Kraft
description:
All things paper drive us wild here at BH!  This hand sewn confetti ribbon is perfect in so many ways!

Dots are 3/4" and 1" in a random pattern chose by the creator, Robin of Trash Can Fancy.  15 feet wound around recycled cardboard.

name: Enamel Letters
description:
Handsome enamel letters are perfect strung up as banners, make lovey labels, key-chains, or tie on to a gift for that little extra oomph... the possibilities are endless!!!

Each letter is sold separately so be sure to specify which letters you want via the drop down menu.  We do our best to keep these in stock but occasionally we will run out of a letter or 2.  Feel free to call the shop 206.623.2626 to check to make sure your desired letters are in stock before purchase. 

All letters are only available in lower case.  Sorry, no punctuation either.   

1 1/2" diameter.

name: Magnet Memo Board with Chalk Trough
description:
Perfect for writing notes and lists with chalk!  Also takes magnets for all your little paper needs. 

Ready for hanging with 2 wall hooks on the back.  Dimensions are 12.5" x 1" x 10".  

Sweet and simple... Just the way we like it!!

name: Magnetic Zinc Chalkboards
description:
How perfect are these!  Write up your menu, a sweet note, or a honey-do...  Limitless uses!

Zinc shipping tag shaped boards strung on a nice thick piece of jute make for an understated modern rustic look.  So fun!

Choose from 4 sizes:

small: 2" x 3.5"/$5
medium: 6.5" x 8"/$12      
large: 8.5" x 12"/$28
x-large: 13" x 18"/$36

name: Box of Chalk
description:
5 pieces of nontoxic, dust-free chalk. Writes great on craft paper, chalkboards, and other surfaces.

Kraft box measures 2.25 x .5 x 3.25.

name: Twig Colored Pencils-Set of 12
description:
Set of 12 twig colored pencils!  So sweet!

Great for kids... Great for guestbook signing... Great for looking pretty!!  

Comes all tied up in a little linen bag.

name: Veggie Stickers-Set of 18
description:
What will they think of next??  

Set includes 2 sheets of an eggplant, pepper, peas, broccoli, two mushrooms, onion, tomato, and carrot. You'll get two sheets of 9 different vegetables each. Each sheet measures 3.5 x 4.5 inches.  Perfect for sealing an envelope or package!  

Choose from kraft or white.

name: Super Strong Magnets
description:
Set of 8 super strong magnets.  1/2" diameter each!

Great with our Magnetic Zinc Boards!!

name: Jute Spool and Scissors
description:
Vintage industrial thread spool repurposed into a sweet twine holder.  Small brass scissors tied on and tuck into the spool add charm and function.   Approx. 2" x 3 1/2" 

Great for the crafter, gardener, or florist in your life!

name: Mason Jar Terrarium Kit
description:
Perfect for the first time terrarium enthusiast!  Kit comes with sweet little mason jar, perforated lid, little pebbles, moss, tiny mushrooms, and little animal decorations... The rest is up to you!

Add soil and plants and whatever other treasures you wish!

name: Recycled Book Alphabet Garland
description:
So sweet!  The entire alphabet punched out of recycled baby board books with little holes included for hanging.  Comes with 3 yards of cheery ribbon. 

Each letter is about 4" tall.

Fun, fun, fun!!

name: Emergency Clown Nose
description:
You never know when this might just come in handy!!

Bright red clown nose tucked inside a cute little prescription bottle with the silliest and sweetest directions printed on the side.  As believers that laughter is in fact the best medicine, we completely endorse this product!!

One size fits all :).

name: Butcher Chart Dishtowel-Beef/Pig/Potato
description:
Awesome!!!  We agree!  18" x 28" woven cotton dishtowel featuring a screen printed butcher chart front and center.  Choose from beef, pork, or potato!!  Blue vertical stripes on the sides.

100% cotton.

name: Dryer Balls-Set of 2
description:
Triple felted handmade wool Dryer Balls are an amazing eco-friendly alternative to dryer sheets.  Laundry dries faster as the natural wool wicks away moisture.  Dryer Balls reduce static like dryer sheets do, but without the chemicals.  All of the bouncing around in your dryer softens the fibers in your clothes replacing the need for fabric softener.  Scent lasts 2-4 loads then super easy to re-scent with your favorite essential oil.  Just squeeze a few drops onto each ball and let set for 10 minutes... good as new.  Made from 100% natural triple felted wool so making them safe for babies and pets.  Best of all... your laundry will smell fresh, feel better, dry faster, and look great without adding any hazardous chemicals of pesticides!  

Each ball is roughly the size of a tennis ball.  Please select color via drop down menu. 

Set of 2 in one color.  

Unscented.

name: Cast Iron Hand Hooks
description:
Great for daily high fives!!  Perfect for holding hand towels, jewelry, purses, keys... The possibilities are endless!

Comes with mounting screws.

Small is 2 1/4" long with a base diameter of 2".

Large is 3" long with a base diameter of 3". OUT OF STOCK

name: Trook! Tree + Hook
description:
Perfectly simple and natural!!  Sweet Trooks are handmade out of natural waste from down trees or from pruning branches.  Each Trook is sanded smooth and given a new life as a hook!!  The current batch we have are beech wood from a fallen tree that was blocking a bridal path.  

Perfect to hang coats, purses, packs... The possibilities are endless!!

Trooks may differ slightly from those pictured but are guaranteed to be equally, if not more, charming!!


Available in 4" wall hook, 5" wall hook, 6" wall hook, or a 3" magnet!!

name: Vintage Nautical Cleat Wall Hook
description:
We love repurposing!!

Great galvanized nautical cleats are lovely hung on the wall as hooks.  Each cleat is a little rusty, a little beat up, and a lot awesome!!

4" long x 3/4" wide.

name: Tree Swing! On 20' rope
description: Old fashioned fun is never out of style.  Incredibly well crafted tree swing hangs from your favorite tree branch or beam in a loft space.  12" seat on a  20' rope!  Simple and sweet!

name: Casa Cabana Cardboard Playhouse!
description:
Fabulous recycled cardboard playhouse ready to decorated however you like.  So much fun!  The possibilities are endless!

Easily folds up into original box for convenient storage.  Built out dimensions:  27" x 27" x 41".

Features one room with sweet little doors and windows to peek out of.  

A new favorite here at BH!!!

*high shipping...  the item ships in a large flat box and is considered 'oversize' by USPS.  Any shipping overcharges will be refunded via method of original payment.

name: Painfully Adorable Felt Hedgehogs
description:
Painfully adorable felt hedgehogs!  Handmade treasures sure to delight children and adults alike!  Very sweet solo or paired with a painfully adorable felt hedgehog mama.  Baby measures just over 1 1/2" long x 1" wide x 1" tall.  Mama measures 2 1/4" x 1 3/4" x 1 1/2".


*Each hedgehog is meticulously handmade and may not be exactly like the one pictured BUT it will certainly be adorable!

*From our hours of in store research... the Painfully Adorable Felt Hedgehogs look best on parade or stacked on top of one another.  

*Hedgehogs are sold individually.

name: Mobile Home Cardboard Dollhouse
description:
Recycled cardboard dollhouse ready to be drawn on, painted on, pasted with treasures...  the possibilities are endless!

All white exterior and fabulous red interior houses 8 rooms with windows, hatches, and door galore.

So much fun!  18"l x 12"h x 9"w

Looking for something bigger?  Check out the Casa Cabana in white!  It's an entire customizable playhouse!!

name: Giant Red Ant
description:
Adorable!  These giant red ants have a wooden body and metal legs and antennae.  They look fabulous in a fantastically whimsical way just about anywhere you place them.  Try them on a fruit bowl or on the kitchen windowsill.  

Just over 3" tall, wide, and long.

Fun, fun, fun!!  Sold individually.

*Very low in stock... More in early 2014

name: Cardboard Safari-Animal Trophies SMALL/MEDIUM/LARGE
description:
Trophies are made from laser cut recycled cardboard.  They will arrive flat and need to be lovingly assembled... Instructions are included.  Designed and manufactured by Cardboard Safari®.  Choose from mini sized SMALLS to larger than life sized LARGES to the somewhere in between MEDIUMS.  

SMALLS $16:

Micro Eyan the Elephant is 6" wide x 6" across x 6" deep. 
Micro Bucky the Deer is 6" wide x 8" across x 5" deep. 
Micro Fred the Moose is 7" wide x 7" tall x 6" deep. 
Micro Robbie the Rhino is 3 1/2" wide x 5" across x 5" deep.

MEDIUMS $32:

Eyan Jr. the Elephant is 12" wide x 12" across x 12" deep. 
Bucky Jr. the Deer is 12" wide x 16" across x 9" deep. 
Fred Jr. the Moose is 13" wide x 12" across x 10" deep. 
Robbie Jr. the Rhino is 7" wide x 10" across x 10" deep.

LARGES $64 (*Special Order Only)

Eyan the Elephant is 24" wide x 24" across x 24" deep.
Bucky the Deer is 24" wide x 33" tall x 18" deep.
Fred the Moose is 24" wide x 20" tall x 19" deep.  
Robbie the Rhino is 12" wide x 19" across x 19" deep.

*LARGE SIZE TROPHIES AVAILABLE FOR SPECIAL ORDER ONLY.  PLEASE EMAIL INFO@BUTTERHOMESEATTLE.COM FOR MORE INFO.

name: Woven Zinc Baskets
description:
Lovely woven zinc baskets are a great way to show off your produce or eggs.  Line with moss for a fantastic planter!!  Great for attractive storage as well...  The uses are endless!!! Sold individually or as a set of 3 that nest together.  


Small:  8" x 8 1/4"
Medium: 10" x 9 1/2"
Large: 12" x 11 1/2"

name: Industrial Wire Trays
description:
Lovely and understated woven wire tray made from hot dipped zinc-plated iron.  A great way to serve or store in style.  

12" x 19" x 2 1/2"

name: Fabulous Vintage French Olive Harvesting Basket
description:
How lovely!  We have just a few of these stunning vintage olive harvesting baskets left. So, if you are on the fence... Now is the time to act!

They are all roughly 18" tall and 16" diameter up top and 10" at the bottom.  Made from heavy galvanized steel with little breathing holes all the way around to keep the delicate fruit from rotting.  So, so, so pretty.  Varied rust patches but mainly the handles and bottoms.

Perfect for any stylish storage or as a garden container!!

name: Woven Wire Doormat
description:
Who ever thought a doormat could be so attractive?  Tough as nails, this woven wire doormat will last a lifetime.

19.7" x 31".

name: Oh Baby, Let's Be Outlaws-8" x 10" Print
description:
Hand screen printed 8" x 10" Outlaws print on acid free, archival quality paper.

Would look great framed or as is...

Makes us giggle every time!!

name: Animal Pile Print-Watercolor
description:
One of our favorites!!!  This sweet pile of animals is a print of an original watercolor by Seattle artist Irene Akio.  

Choose from 8.5'" x 11" or 11.5" x 16".  

Ships flat.

name: Kraft Fabric Paper and Tyvek Reusable Tote + Leather Handles
description:
A new shop fave for sure!! Kraft paper and Tyvek industrial paper sewn into a perfect tote fitted with leather handles. Kraft paper and Tyvek are incredibly durable materials yet still light weight, waterproof, and tear resistant.  

3 sizes available:

small:  OUT OF STOCK
medium:  OUT F STOCK
large:  17.5 x 12 x 6

name: Kraft Fabric Paper Reusable Tote + Leather Handles
description:
A new shop fave for sure!! Kraft paper sewn into a perfect tote fitted with leather handles. Kraft paper is incredibly durable yet still light weight, waterproof, and tear resistant.  

3 sizes available:

small:  OUT OF STOCK
medium:  14.5 x 10 x 5
large:  17.5 x 12 x 6

name: Recycled Cotton Tote-Ship
description:
Great oversized recycled cotton tote!  Screen printed with stately ship hand drawn original design by Oh, Little Rabbit.  

100% Recycled cotton Eco Bag
19"W x 15.5"H x 7.5" gusset
100% recycled cotton
Printed with non toxic water based inks that are safe for you and the environment!
Machine wash cold, hang dry

Holds MUCH more than an ordinary brown paper grocery bag!

name: Recycled Cotton Tote-Goldfish
description:
Great oversized recycled cotton tote!  Screen printed with super fun goldfish hand drawn original design by Oh, Little Rabbit.  

100% Recycled cotton Eco Bag
19"W x 15.5"H x 7.5" gusset
100% recycled cotton
Printed with non toxic water based inks that are safe for you and the environment!
Machine wash cold, hang dry

Holds MUCH more than an ordinary brown paper grocery bag!

name: Recycled Cotton Tote-Lemons
description:
Great oversized recycled cotton tote!  Screen printed with lovely lemons hand drawn original design by Oh, Little Rabbit.  

100% Recycled cotton Eco Bag
19"W x 15.5"H x 7.5" gusset
100% recycled cotton
Printed with non toxic water based inks that are safe for you and the environment!
Machine wash cold, hang dry

Holds MUCH more than an ordinary brown paper grocery bag!

name: Baggu Mahogany Leather Pouch-Small or Large
description:
Baggu does bags right!

Small is just the right size for your phone, money, and keys. Super soft natural milled leather. 
5" wide / 5" tall. Brass zipper. Made in NYC.

Large is perfect for holding your phone, wallet, camera, and other valuables. Or carry alone as a clutch for a night out. Super soft natural milled leather. 
8.5" wide / 8.5" tall. Brass zipper. Made in NYC.

name: Baggu Reusable Grocery Bag-Cats
description:
Not just for the grocery store!  Carry in your hand or over your shoulder. Holds 2-3 plastic grocery bags effortlessly. 

15.5" Wide / 25.5" high / 6" deep. Folds into a flat 5" by 5" pouch. Holds 50 lbs. 100% Ripstop nylon. Machine washable.

Awesome!!!

name: Baggu Reusable Grocery Bag-Elephants
description:

name: Baggu Canvas Tote-Navy Stripe
description:
A book bag, a market carry-all, the perfect everyday tote.
Carry in your hand, on your shoulder, or across your chest. Brings home everything from a laptop to groceries.

16" high / 10" wide / 5.5" deep. 40" adjustable shoulder strap. Snap closure. Interior pocket. 16oz recycled cotton canvas.

name: Baggu Canvas Tote-Chestnut
description:
A book bag, a market carry-all, the perfect everyday tote.
Carry in your hand, on your shoulder, or across your chest. Brings home everything from a laptop to groceries.

16" high / 10" wide / 5.5" deep. 40" adjustable shoulder strap. Snap closure. Interior pocket. 16oz recycled cotton canvas.

description:

Carry in your hand, on your shoulder, or across your chest. Brings home everything from a laptop to groceries.

16" high / 10" wide / 5.5" deep. 40" adjustable shoulder strap. Snap closure. Interior pocket. 16oz recycled cotton canvas.

description:

16" high / 10" wide / 5.5" deep. 40" adjustable shoulder strap. Snap closure. Interior pocket. 16oz recycled cotton canvas.

description:

Carry in your hand, on your shoulder, or across your chest. Brings home everything from a laptop to groceries.

16" high / 10" wide / 5.5" deep. 40" adjustable shoulder strap. Snap closure. Interior pocket. 16oz recycled cotton canvas.

name: Kitty Ring
description:
Ohmygoodness!!  3D printed kitty rings are pretty much the best ever.  That's right... As if Kitty Rings aren't neat enough as is, these are 3D printed... WOAH!

These are available in polished steel or gold plate and are ridiculously adorable.  

Made in England by The Rogue and The Wolf.

Check drop down menu for size availability.  We stock sizes 5-9 but special orders are always an option.

name: Peter Pan Collar Necklace-Handcut-Gold or Silver
description:
A true labor of love by NY artist Virginie Millefiori!!  Each necklace is hand sawed brass, then polished and plated in either sterling silver or 14k gold.  Just beautiful!!

Available in silver or gold!

Silver is sold out at the moment.  Available for special order only.  Please contact the shop to place an order:  206.623.2626 or info@butterhomeseattle.com

name: Sweet Scalloped Necklace-Handcut-Gold or Silver
description:
The sweet lil' sister to the Peter Pan Collar Necklace!

Handmade by NY artist Virginie Millefiori!! Each necklace is hand sawed brass, then polished and plated in either sterling silver or 14k gold. Just beautiful!!

Available in silver or gold.

name: Triangle Studs-Coral
description:
Handmade triangle studs with an engraved triangle well filled with coral colored enamel.  Studs are 14kt gold plated sterling silver. 

1/4 inch wide on each side... Perfectly dainty with just the right punch of color!!

Posts and ear backs are 100% sterling silver.

name: Peanut Pocketknife Necklace
description:
Every once in a while a piece come along that utterly knocks our socks off!!  This, friends, is one such piece!

Vintage brassy 1" peanut with a real functioning pocketknife dangles gracefully from a 24" gold plated chain.  Whimsy at it's best!

name: Moon Rising Earrings
description:
Handmade sterling silver and brass earrings by Knuckle Kiss.  Sterling silver posts, wires, and catches suitable for sensitive ears.  

2.75" long.

name: Brass Kite Hoops
description:
Handmade Brass Kite Hoops by Knuckle Kiss!  A fresh take on traditional hoops!!

2" x 1.25"

Choose from: Brass or Silver-both with sterling silver posts and catches suitable for sensitive ears.

name: Four Square Stud
description:
.25" square of sweet and simple handcrafted beauty by Knuckle Kiss!

Sterling silver.

name: Desert Triangle Hoops
description:
Modern geometric hoops by Knuckle Kiss.  Handmade in Seattle!!

Choose from nickel silver or brass, both fitted with a sterling silver post suitable for sensitive ears.  

1.75" long.  

Hard wax finished.

name: Textured Disc Post Earrings
description:
A shop fave!!

Modern primitive silver fill discs hand textured by Knuckle Kiss!  

At 3/4" round, they are the perfect size for a bold post earring!

name: Geometric Hoops
description:
We can't get enough of Knuckle Kiss Jewelry!!

These simple hoops are just shy of 1".  Hand cut in either brass or nickel silver and fitted with sterling silver posts suitable for sensitive ears.

name: Gold/Silver Trio Necklace
description:
So sweet and simple!  3 sterling silver rounds in a row hang from a 14k gold fill chain.  Such a fun and wearable piece of jewelry.  The rounds measure 3/4" all together making the total length of this necklace 16 3/4".  Just the right length for a subtle yet stunning every day piece.

Also see this item in gold, gold rounds on a silver chain, and silver.  

Made in Seattle by Foamy Wader

Images courtesy of Foamy Wader

name: Silver/Gold Trio Necklace
description:
So sweet and simple!  3 14k gold fill rounds in a row hand from a 16" sterling silver chain.  Such a fun and wearable piece of jewelry.  The rounds measure 3/4" all together making the total length of this necklace 16 3/4".  Just the right length for a subtle yet stunning every day piece.

Also see this item in gold, silver, and silver rounds on a gold chain.  

Made in Seattle by Foamy Wader

Images courtesy of Foamy Wader

name: Gold Trio Necklace
description:
So sweet and simple!  3 14k golf fill rounds in a row hang from a 16" 14k gold fill chain.  Such a fun and wearable piece of jewelry.  The rounds measure 3/4" all together making the total length of this necklace 16 3/4".  Just the right length for a subtle yet stunning every day piece.

Also see this item in silver, gold rounds on a silver chain, and silver rounds on a gold chain.  

Made in Seattle by Foamy Wader

Images courtesy of Foamy Wader

name: Silver Trio Necklace
description:
So sweet and simple!  3 sterling silver rounds in a row hang from a 16" sterling silver chain.  Such a fun and wearable piece of jewelry.  The rounds measure 3/4" all together making the total length of this necklace 16 3/4".  Just the right length for a subtle yet stunning every day piece.

Also see this item in gold, gold rounds on a silver chain, and silver rounds on a gold chain.  

Made in Seattle by Foamy Wader

Images courtesy of Foamy Wader

name: Magnifying Glass Necklace
description:
In honor of my Grandmother who was too vain to wear her reading glasses well into her 80's... She would hold them over restaurant menus to magnify the text, but never put them on...  If only she had one of these awesome necklaces!  The ocular lens measures 1 1/2" diameter and is securely fitted into a burnished brass setting.  The pendant hangs from a 28" burnished brass chain. 

A fun and functional piece perfect for your next adventure!

name: Large Luma Brass Necklace
description:
2" brushed brass leaf hangs delicately from a 17.5" oxidized sterling chain.  A pyrite nugget accents the piece in a sweetly off center placement.  

Lumafina.  Portland, OR

name: Large Luma Brass Earrings
description:
Sweet brushed brass leaves hang from oxidized sterling ear wires.

2 1/2" top to bottom including ear wire.

Lumafina.  Portland,OR

name: Paper Mache Zebra Taxidermy Mount-Originally $165
description: Oh sweet Zebra, you are so very lovely to gaze upon!!  Hand painted paper mache measuring up approx. 15" x 15" is sure to add a touch of whimsical beauty to your space.

name: Paper Mache Hippo Taxidermy Mount-Originally $235
description: Clearly this smiling hippopotamus is not a threat like his real life relatives.  Hand painted paper mache, this wall trophy is sure to brighten up any room.  15" x 12" x 16".

name: Paper Mache Walrus Taxidermy Mount
description:
Sometimes we are at a loss for words when describing our favorite products!!  This is one of those instances....

For sale is one paper mache walrus taxidermy wall mount.  Hand made and hand painted, the details on this little fella will bring you to tears.  

Each walrus varies slightly but measure roughly 13" x 13".

name: Fancy Birch Chandelier-WAS $76
description:
This sweet birch chandelier will add a touch of fancy to any space!

Ships flat, requires simple assembly. Hangs from approximately 16" of braided metal wire. 

24"w x 24"d x 14.25"h.

Decorative... Does not light up.

name: Recycled Glass Terrarium-WAS $85
description:
Cool free-blown terrarium made from glass with a high recycled content.  Each terrarium rests upon 8 feet of natural sisal rope for hanging.  A 3 inch round opening is perfect for putting in air plants, succulents, rocks, flowers, fresh greens... anything your heart desires.

Because they are handmade, each terrarium varies slightly in size.  They range from 7"-8" in diameter x 12"-13" tall.

Terrariums come WITHOUT the plants and rocks shown.  That is part of the fun!!!
